headline: COPLEY CONTROLS CORP. DC HIGH POWER AMPLIFIER
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > DC Power Supplies
specstable:
Manufacturer Copley Controls Corp
Model 234
Regulation Modes Constant Current Constant Voltage
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Other Information

Amplifier may be Master/Slave for 2X Output Current

Power Requirements

Fan Supply Required +28 V @ 2 A
High Voltage Supply +50 V to +160 V
Current required to supply load I2R losses plus amplifier losses
Quiescent Current 1.3 A
Internal Capacitance 72000 μF

Applications

Electromagnet excitation in particle guidance and focus in nuclear accelerator
Magnetic bearings and magnetic levitation
Vibration isolation
Automobile shock absorbers
Battery/fuel cell simulator for charge/discharge cycles
Motion control, including brushed, brushless, and multiphase DC linear mototrs
High DC stability (> 20 ppm/°C); paralleled for high current output filtering for perturbation-free magnetic field control

Extended Description Details at 234P04.pdf
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 23.000 in (58.4 cm)
Height 10.500 in (26.7 cm)
Weight 75 lb (34 kg)
